---
title: "Interactive Plotly Presentation"
author: "Saad Ul Islam"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(plotly)
```


```{r plot, echo=FALSE }
plot_ly(
  data = mtcars,
  x = ~wt,
  y = ~mpg,
  type = 'scatter',
  mode = 'markers',
  color = ~cyl,
  text = ~paste("Model:", rownames(mtcars)),
  marker = list(size = 10)
)
```
